○ Trends in traffic accidents by year（19: * １　Data for 1959 and all preceding years does not include minor accidents (injury requiring less than eight days of treatment or property damage of up to 20,000 yen in value).
２　Data for 1965 and all preceding years includes property damage-only accidents.
３　Data for 1971 and all preceding years does not cover Okinawa Prefecture.
５　Per capita data are calculated on the basis of the population as of October 1st in the previous year compiled by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications.
